metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6629 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Wi-Fi in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48Z allows attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 22667667.

notes.Note: jdstrand> Ubuntu does not use Android Wi-Fi

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
